org.apache.solr.handler.component

Class DateFacetProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.request.SimpleFacets
      • org.apache.solr.handler.component.DateFacetProcessor
  • Deprecated. 
    the whole date faceting feature is deprecated. Use range facets instead which can already work with dates.

    @Deprecated
public class DateFacetProcessor
extends SimpleFacets
    Process date facets

      • getFacetDateCounts

        @Deprecated
public NamedList<Object> getFacetDateCounts()
                                     throws IOException
        Deprecated. Use getFacetRangeCounts which is more generalized
        Returns a list of value constraints and the associated facet counts for each facet date field, range, and interval specified in the SolrParams
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
